articles.title: Pacers Sports & Entertainment unveils plans to build world-class, $78M Indiana Fever Sports Performance Center - Indiana Fever
articles.description: INDIANAPOLIS (Jan. 16, 2025) – Pacers Sports & Entertainment today released plans to break ground this summer on a state-of-the-art, $78 million exclusive sports performance center for the Indiana Fever in the heart of downtown Indianapolis. Construction of t…
